mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLICKS c JOIN PRODUCT_CONTENT pc ON pc.PRODUCT_ID = c.PRODUCT_ID JOIN CONTENT ct ON ct.ID = pc.CONTENT_ID WHERE ct.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT TO_CHAR(day_key, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS clickDate, SUM(clicks) AS clicks, SUM(uploads) AS uploads FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(c.CLICKED_AT) AS day_key, COUNT(*) AS clicks, 0 AS uploads FROM CLICKS c JOIN PRODUCT_CONTENT pc ON pc.PRODUCT_ID = c.PRODUCT_ID JOIN CONTENT ct ON ct.ID = pc.CONTENT_ID WHERE ct.USER_ID = #{userId} AND TRUNC(c.CLICKED_AT) BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY TRUNC(c.CLICKED_AT) UNION ALL SELECT TRUNC(ct.CREATED_AT) AS day_key, 0 AS clicks, COUNT(*) AS uploads FROM CONTENT ct WHERE ct.USER_ID = #{userId} AND TRUNC(ct.CREATED_AT) BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY TRUNC(ct.CREATED_AT) ) t GROUP BY day_key ORDER BY day_key
